languages.text: {n}Пока Хейнрикс ван Калокс говорит, вы вдруг замечаете, как именно он на вас смотрит — чуть прищурясь, словно вглядываясь в самую душу... душу, тронутую даром колдовства. Заметив ваш ответный взгляд, дознаватель чуть поднимает один угол рта, давая понять — он безошибочно разглядел {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}подобн{mf|ого|ую} себе.{/d}{/n}

{n}As Heinrix van Calox speaks, you suddenly notice the way he is looking at you — with his eyes slightly narrowed, as if he is peering into your soul... a soul that is touched by the gift of sorcery. The change in your expression does not escape the Interrogator's notice, and you see the corner of his mouth twitch. He must have instantly recognised a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}fellow psyker{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пока Хейнрикс ван Калокс говорит, вы вдруг замечаете, как именно он на вас смотрит — чуть прищурясь, словно вглядываясь в самую душу... душу, тронутую даром колдовства. Заметив ваш ответный взгляд, дознаватель чуть поднимает один угол рта, давая понять — он безошибочно разглядел {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}подобн{mf|ого|ую} себе.{/d}{/n}

The change in your expression does not escape the Interrogator's notice, and you see the corner of his mouth twitch. He must have instantly recognised a fellow psyker.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als Heinrix van Calox spricht, bemerkst du plötzlich, wie er dich ansieht – die Augen leicht verengt, als blicke er in deine Seele ... eine Seele, die von der Gabe der Zauberei berührt wurde. Die Veränderung deiner Miene entgeht dem Interrogator nicht, und sein Mundwinkel zuckt. Er muss sofort erkannt haben, dass du {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}auch Psioniker{/d} bist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Heinrix van Calox speaks, you suddenly notice the way he is looking at you — with his eyes slightly narrowed, as if he is peering into your soul... a soul that is touched by the gift of sorcery. The change in your expression does not escape the Interrogator's notice, and you see the corner of his mouth twitch. He must have instantly recognised a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}fellow psyker{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Heinrix van Calox spricht, bemerkst du plötzlich, wie er dich ansieht – die Augen leicht verengt, als blicke er in deine Seele ... eine Seele, die von der Gabe der Zauberei berührt wurde. Die Veränderung deiner Miene entgeht dem Interrogator nicht, und sein Mundwinkel zuckt. Er muss sofort erkannt haben, dass du auch Psioniker bist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tandis qu'Heinrix van Calox s'adresse à vous, vous remarquez soudain la façon dont il vous regarde : les yeux légèrement plissés, comme s'il scrutait au plus profond de votre âme... une âme touchée par le don de la sorcellerie. L'interrogateur ne manque pas de détecter ce changement sur votre visage et vous voyez le coin de sa bouche tressauter. Il a dû comprendre instantanément qu'il était face à {mf|un|une} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}autre psyker{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Heinrix van Calox speaks, you suddenly notice the way he is looking at you — with his eyes slightly narrowed, as if he is peering into your soul... a soul that is touched by the gift of sorcery. The change in your expression does not escape the Interrogator's notice, and you see the corner of his mouth twitch. He must have instantly recognised a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}fellow psyker{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tandis qu'Heinrix van Calox s'adresse à vous, vous remarquez soudain la façon dont il vous regarde : les yeux légèrement plissés, comme s'il scrutait au plus profond de votre âme... une âme touchée par le don de la sorcellerie. L'interrogateur ne manque pas de détecter ce changement sur votre visage et vous voyez le coin de sa bouche tressauter. Il a dû comprendre instantanément qu'il était face à {mf|un|une} autre psyker.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你突然注意到，海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯说话时，也在打量着你。他微微眯起了眼睛，似乎在窥视你的灵魂……被巫术的力量触碰过的灵魂。你的表情发生了变化，这样的变化没有逃过这位审讯官的眼睛。你看到他的嘴角微微抽搐了一下，他肯定已经一眼认出你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}也是灵能者{/d}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Heinrix van Calox speaks, you suddenly notice the way he is looking at you — with his eyes slightly narrowed, as if he is peering into your soul... a soul that is touched by the gift of sorcery. The change in your expression does not escape the Interrogator's notice, and you see the corner of his mouth twitch. He must have instantly recognised a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}fellow psyker{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你突然注意到，海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯说话时，也在打量着你。他微微眯起了眼睛，似乎在窥视你的灵魂……被巫术的力量触碰过的灵魂。你的表情发生了变化，这样的变化没有逃过这位审讯官的眼睛。你看到他的嘴角微微抽搐了一下，他肯定已经一眼认出你也是灵能者。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスが話している間、急に彼が自身を見る目つきに気が付く。まるで魂を覗き込むように、微かに目を細めている…魔術の贈り物が触れた魂を。インテロゲイターはあなたの表情の変化を見逃さず、その口が引きつるのが見て取れる。彼はすぐに{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}もう一人の異能者{/d}の存在に気づいたに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Heinrix van Calox speaks, you suddenly notice the way he is looking at you — with his eyes slightly narrowed, as if he is peering into your soul... a soul that is touched by the gift of sorcery. The change in your expression does not escape the Interrogator's notice, and you see the corner of his mouth twitch. He must have instantly recognised a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}fellow psyker{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスが話している間、急に彼が自身を見る目つきに気が付くーーまるで魂を覗き込むように、微かに目を細めている…魔術の贈り物が触れた魂を。インテロゲイターはあなたの表情の変化を見逃さず、その口が引きつるのが見て取れる。彼はすぐにもう一人の異能者の存在に気づいたに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mientras Heinrix van Calox habla, percibes cómo te mira: con los ojos entrecerrados, como si pudiera escudriñar tu alma... un alma que posee el don de la hechicería. El interrogador no pasa por alto el cambio en tu expresión y ves la comisura de su labio torcerse. Ha logrado reconocer a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}otr{mf|o|a} psíquic{mf|o|a}{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Heinrix van Calox speaks, you suddenly notice the way he is looking at you — with his eyes slightly narrowed, as if he is peering into your soul... a soul that is touched by the gift of sorcery. The change in your expression does not escape the Interrogator's notice, and you see the corner of his mouth twitch. He must have instantly recognised a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}fellow psyker{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras Heinrix van Calox habla, percibes cómo te mira: con los ojos entrecerrados, como si pudiera escudriñar tu alma... un alma que posee el don de la hechicería. El interrogador no pasa por alto el cambio en tu expresión y ves la comisura de su labio torcerse. Ha logrado reconocer a otro psíquico.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox konuştuğu sırada aniden sana nasıl baktığını fark ediyorsun. Gözleri sanki ruhuna, sahirlik lütfuyla kutsanmış ruhuna bakıyormuş gibi hafifçe kısılmış. İfadendeki değişiklik, Sorgucu'nun dikkatinden kaçmıyor. Ağzının kenarının seğirdiğini görüyorsun. Ruhsezer, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}hemcinsini{/d} hemen ayırt etmiş olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Heinrix van Calox speaks, you suddenly notice the way he is looking at you — with his eyes slightly narrowed, as if he is peering into your soul... a soul that is touched by the gift of sorcery. The change in your expression does not escape the Interrogator's notice, and you see the corner of his mouth twitch. He must have instantly recognised a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}fellow psyker{/d}.{/n}

İfadendeki değişiklik, Sorgucu'nun dikkatinden kaçmıyor. Ağzının kenarının seğirdiğini görüyorsun. Ruhsezer, hemcinsini hemen ayırt etmiş olmalı.{/n}

{n}Heinrix van Calox konuştuğu sırada aniden sana nasıl baktığını fark ediyorsun. Gözleri sanki ruhuna, sahirlik lütfuyla kutsanmış ruhuna bakıyormuş gibi hafifçe kısılmış. İfadendeki değişiklik, Sorgucu'nun dikkatinden kaçmıyor. Ağzının kenarının seğirdiğini görüyorsun. Ruhsezer, hemcinsini hemen ayırt etmiş olmalı.{/n}
